mapper.select: select p.id as id, p.uid as uid, p.app_uid as appUid, p.version as version, p.configuration as configuration, p.total_count as totalCount, p.status as status, p.creator as creator, p.updater as updater, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_time as updateTime, p.tenant_id as tenantId, json_unquote(JSON_EXTRACT(p.configuration, '$.appInformation.name')) as appName, u.nickname as creatorName from llm_creative_plan p left join system_users u on p.creator = u.id where p.deleted = false and u.deleted = false and p.source = 'APP' order by CASE WHEN p.creator = #{currentUserId} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, p.create_time desc limit #{limit}

select p.id as id, p.uid as uid, p.app_uid as appUid, p.version as version, p.configuration as configuration, p.total_count as totalCount, p.status as status, p.creator as creator, p.updater as updater, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_time as updateTime, p.tenant_id as tenantId, a.name as appName, u.nickname as creatorName from llm_creative_plan p left join system_users u on p.creator = u.id inner join llm_app a on a.uid = p.app_uid where p.deleted = false and u.deleted = false and a.deleted = false and p.source = #{source} order by CASE WHEN p.creator = #{userId} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, p.create_time desc limit #{limit}
